title: (1) Burg Klopp and Bingen, Downstream with Boat in Foreground; (2) View down Rhine towards the Mäuseturm and Burg Ehrenfels; (3) Crane and Custom House, Bingen, Upstream; (4) Rüdesheim from Bingen; (5) Custom House, Bingen; (6) Rüdesheim from Rhine
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
